subject: Football
Coaches and Managers
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
lead_paragraph: John Blake, North Carolina’s associate head coach, resigned in the wake of an N.C.A.A. investigation into the program, saying “my presence has become a distraction” to the university.
snippet: John Blake, North Carolina’s associate head coach, resigned in the wake of an N.C.A.A. investigation into the program, saying “my presence has become a distraction” to the university.
